summary:
PROJECT - At Stay Human Labs, we’re dedicated to pushing the boundaries of web3 technology through our groundbreaking project, Gunpowder. Gunpowder is an innovative platform that merges NFTs and our flagship $GUN tokens, allowing players to wager on custom servers and compete in PvP battles for exciting rewards.

 TEAM - Founder & practical implementer Gunpowder Genesis. Based in Japan.

 TEAM - Token and Server Developer of Gunpowder Genesis. Head of Development. Based in Germany.

 TEAM - Professional Artist for over 15 years. Based in Japan.

 LIVE SERVERS - Max POP - 60. Platform - Steam. Tags - Airdrop, PVP, Bounty

 LIVE SERVERS - Max POP - 12. Platform - Steam. Tags - PVP

 LIVE SERVERS - Max POP - 48. Platform - Steam. Tags - MINIGAMES, RP

 OSHIMARU - CEO, Stay Human Labs -ステイヒューマンラボ
